name: buttonL.isPressed
content:
Determines if the button is being pressed or not

Much like [`toggleSwitch.isOpen`(#f78183)](/docs/applab/toggleSwitch.isOpen/), [`buttonL.isPressed`(#f78183)](/docs/applab/isPressed/) returns boolean `true` if the button is being pressed, otherwise, returns `false`. This property is best to use with conditionals.
short_description: Determines if the button is being pressed or not
